fa23d814-07ef-47c9-a9af-b70cf1d5b068: A mercenary undertaking his task with cold, professional detachment, the assassin is equally adept at espionage, bounty hunting, and terrorism. At his core, an assassin is an artisan, and his medium is death. Trained in a variety of killing techniques, assassins are among the most feared classes.
651e936c-05ef-424b-8106-27b0127c0307:
An assassin can make a special {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} with a melee weapon against a target that doesn't know about the assassin. The attack has the additional effect of possibly either paralyzing or killing the target (assassin's choice). Death attack is a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}. The death attack fails if the target detects the assassin or recognizes the assassin as an enemy. If the victim of such a death attack fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + the assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Class_Level}class level{/g} + the assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} modifier) against the kill effect, they die. If the saving throw fails against the paralysis effect, the victim is rendered {g|Encyclopedia:Helpless}helpless{/g} and unable to act for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} plus 1 round per level of the assassin. If the victim's saving throw succeeds, the attack is just a normal attack.
At 10th level, the death attack becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}.
ae966ad8-a805-48b0-8339-481221b2e1c0: Assassins are proficient with the crossbow, dagger, rapier, shortbow, and shortsword. Assassins are proficient with light armor but not with shields.
021a2924-0ff0-4996-a9e6-5389c214aeb6:
Assassins specialize in poison use. Every day they create special combat poisons, the number of their doses equal to 3 + assassin level, which they can use to envenom their melee weapons. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, an assassin can apply one of the poisons to their melee weapon, and the next successful {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} applies it to the target. {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of all poisons is 10 + assassin level + {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} modifier. If the attack that applied the poison was a sneak attack, the DC is increased by 2. If the target is someone with the Mark of Death, she must make two saving throws when poisoning and choose the worst result.
At 2st level, an assassin has access to poisons that deal 1d4 stat damage to Strength or Dexterity for 4 rounds.
At 3rd level, the duration of the poisons increases by 1 round.
At 4th level, assassin gains access to poison that deals Constitution damage.
At 5th level, an the number of successful saving throws needed to remove the poison increases to 2.
At 6th level, the duration of the poisons increases by 1 round.
At 7th level, an assassin can apply the poisons as a move or a swift action.
At 8th level, the duration of the poisons increases by 1 round.
At 9th level, the number of successful saving throws needed to remove the poison increases to 3.
At 10th level, an assassin's poison target takes poison damage on a success Fortitude save.
b3897d7a-ff74-4d74-be69-9c63f76c8723: At 2nd level, the assassin gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against poisons. This bonus increases by +1 every two levels.
2a8b632a-2796-4c2d-bafc-f886a3fb0864: At 3rd, 6th and 8th level, the duration of the poisons increases by 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
5005ee77-50d1-48c6-9cf5-186b6cfbe12f: At 4th level, an assassin gains access to poison that deals {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}Constitution damage{/g}.
bda4d596-5ecc-4922-be0f-242df601fa3a: At 7th level, an assassin can apply the poisons as a move or a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
4db45cee-82d8-4e1b-be74-3b75807e76c2: At 8th level, an assassin can use the {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} even while being observed. An assassin can hide himself from view in the open without having anything to actually hide behind.
edc673c8-66b5-43dc-9921-4f96d3e36830: At 9th level, the number of successes needed to remove the poison increases to 3.
